column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Like Au Cheval and Maude's
column2: Bavette's has great cocktails.  I started with the Sazerac and was not disappointed.  Wonderfully blended
column3: it was a traditional Sazerac with an absinthe rinsed glass instead of putting the absinthe right into the cocktail.  I definitely want to go back to try some of the other drinks.
